note.p: Education: Trinity College, Dublin (admitted 1700); University College, Oxford (matriculated 1706); Leyden; MD (1709); Dublin; MD (1711); Middle Temple (admitted 1715)
Career: Professor of Botany at Dublin (1711); practised in Dublin
Proposed again after his election by John Theophilus Desaguliers (05 December 1717)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Innes Smith; Foster; Burtchaell; MT; In printed list 1718-1722
